document_data.caption: A map showing Narubel Pass in the Sanrach Mountains north of the Samarlogh.
document_data.name: Narubel Pass
document_data.mainbody: '''Narubel Pass''' was a dangerous and mostly forsaken mountain pass found on the [[Chultan Peninsula]].
document_data.Geography: The pass was located in the central region of the northern arm of the [[Sanrach Mountains]].
document_data.Description: Narubel Pass connected the independent coastal city of [[Narubel]] in the north with [[Samarach]] in the south.
document_data.Activities: The pass was rarely used as of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, as trade between Narubel and Samarach was forbidden. Dangerous creatures awaited any travelers along the pass when they reached the [[Samarlogh]].
